content: whether you want to make a thoughtful housewarming gift a last minute christmas present or you just want to use up some scrap yarn these super simple crochet coasters are for you by using just two stitches you can make these beautifully simple coasters in an array of colors to compliment your home or use some scrap yarn to make them a little funky you will need * medium weight yarn i used paintbox yarns recycled cotton worsted * 4 5mm crochet hook
